item.title: PTC INC 10-K
item.description: PTC INC, which is in the Services-Prepackaged Software [7372] industry, SEC 10-K filing on November 15, 2022 had 27350 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: million - 422 instances 2022 - 288 instances 30 - 276 instances september - 260 instances tax - 233 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
